QuestData.Title: Favorite Fruit
QuestData.Description:
Mystic training is so boring. I'm watching water be wet half of my days. My brothers are already out in the wild hunting drakes and primalists, and making a difference in the world.
Anyway, I promised I'd show you something cool! Did you know mudstompers love bushfruit? It grows nearby, among the geysers. Go pick some and we can feed them together.
QuestData.LogDescription: Forage Wild Bushfruit from the Ohn'ir Geysers and feed them to $1oa Lounging Mudstompers.
QuestData.RewardText: Seems like they like you! Or just the fruit. That's okay too. <Radiya winks.>
